amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program by $55 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce appropriations for Departmental Management of the Department of Commerce and General Administration of the Department of Justice, and increase appropriations for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance programs, and the State Criminal Alien Asstistance Program (SCAAP).

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Lofgren, Zoe.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren, Zoe amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 388 - 39 (Roll no. 725).
